system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.U21jUxWWz3lhDTau]{turn to violence} against someone by seriously escalating the conflict, roll with MIND instead of BLOOD

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, you inflict harm as established and your opposition chooses one:

  • they inflict harm on you
  • they put you in a bad spot
  • they create an opening to flee

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you inflict harm as established and your opposition chooses one:

  • they inflict harm on you
  • they put you in a bad spot
  • they create an opening to flee

On a 10+, you also choose one:

  • you inflict terrible harm
  • you take something from them
  • you create an opportunity for an ally
